org.hibernate.search.engine.nulls.codec.impl

Class NotEncodingCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.search.engine.nulls.codec.impl.NotEncodingCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NullMarkerCodec

    public class NotEncodingCodec
extends Object
implements NullMarkerCodec
    Implementation of NullMarkerCodec which implements the no-op strategy of not writing anything to the index for null values.
    Author:
    Sanne Grinovero
